*** LEADERBOARD 2.0 - A complete redesign of competitive play! ***
DAILY LEADERBOARD: Play up to 20 games per day. Your best 10 scores are summed into a daily score. Play at least 3 games to qualify for the daily board.
WEEKLY LEADERBOARD: Your best 5 daily scores each week (Mon-Sun) are combined into a weekly score. Play at least 3 qualifying days to rank.
ALL-TIME LEADERBOARD: Your career Average Game Score across all eligible games. Play 50+ games to earn your all-time ranking. Best single game score also tracked.

FEATURED STATS: A new stat highlights each day, rotating through Hot Dice (best single round), Farkle Rate (lowest farkle %), Comeback King (biggest deficit overcome), Hot Streak (win streak), and Consistency (steadiest scorer).
Friends-first view with rivalry labels, rank movement arrows, and head-to-head cards when playing with 2-3 friends
Post-game toast shows your leaderboard impact after each eligible game
Daily game counter in lobby tracks your progress toward the 20-game cap
Win streak tracking added to player profiles
Solo games and bot games are excluded from leaderboard rankings
